paper_abstract: We propose matchgate tensors as a natural and proper language to develop Valiant's new theory of Holographic Algorithms. We give a treatment of the central theorem in this theory -the Holant Theorem - in terms of matchgate tensors. Some generalizations are presented. (c) 2007 Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: Valiant's Holant theorem and matchgate tensors
